title: CEO as AI Champion Structure
summary: Founder transitions from CEO to Executive Chairman specifically to focus on AI integration across the business

content.whatItIs: Mercado Libre is making a structural statement about AI's centrality: founder Marcos Galperin will transition from CEO to Executive Chairman on January 1, 2026, specifically to focus 'quite a bit' on artificial intelligence integration across the business.
howItWorks: Founder Marcos Galperin transitions from CEO to Executive Chairman (January 2026)
Move 'elevates AI from a departmental function to the central organizing principle of the company's long-term vision'
Rather than delegating AI to a CAIO or technical function, the founder himself becomes AI champion at highest level
$13.2B investment in 2025—record including $5.8B Brazil, $3.4B Mexico (explicit AI focus), $2.6B Argentina
GenAds (generative AI advertising): 45% increase in impressions, 90,000+ product creatives across 7 countries
content.coreInsight: In transformative technology transitions, consider restructuring leadership so founders or CEOs can dedicate themselves to the new capability. The CEO-as-AI-champion structure signals organizational priority more clearly than creating new C-suite titles.
content.keyMetrics: 28,000 employees to be added (33% headcount increase). $1.4T total payment volume processed. 18,000+ engineers making it a premier tech employer in Latin America.
